website_summaries.verdict: This variety may be on the pricy side, but it is completely grain-free and loaded with high-quality protein for a balanced diet to maintain your dog’s health over time.
pros: Includes prebiotic fibers for digestive health, and linoleic acid for a healthy coat
cons: Not for dogs with a poultry allergy

customer_reviews.title: It is perfect to have his dog food for less than the ...
customer_reviews.text: We always feed this food to our dog and never have a problem; however, this last bag had something wrong with it and our 2.5 year old lab is at the vet with a severe reaction. He is covered in hives and his entire face is swollen, the only thing that is changed is we refilled his dog food with this new bag of dog food. We will never order dog food through Amazon again, as the food was bad and has made him very sick.
customer_reviews.author: mjillian38

customer_reviews.title: Riley loves it!  Keeps his coat and skin very healthy!
customer_reviews.text: Riley is the most picky eater we've ever had and I have what I call "the dog food graveyard" cabinet. We've tried so many different brands of dog food, but mostly they had to be grain free and include salmon. Purina Pro Plan Savor Grain-Free Shredded Blend (with beef and salmon) fits the bill for us! This dog food makes his coat and skin so soft & healthy! Riley has now been eating Pro Plan for about a year and still loves it. And I am excited that it now includes probiotics so I don't have to give him a separate pill for that anymore! Very satisfied customers!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: I switched my staffy to PPP Focus Sensitive Skin & Stomach after she started showing signs of DCM on the Rachael Ray Just 6 she'd been eating. The switch did reverse her symptoms but then she started having an allergic reaction to the Focus, which turned her poor skin red and bloody with patches of missing fur. After a month on this grain-free Savor her skin has healed up and her fur is growing back in. Her coat is looking nice and shiny too. My only complaint is the price -- $2.37/lb is ridiculous. The Pro Plan Focus was only $1.60/lb for a 30lb bag. Otherwise it's a good product.
customer_reviews.author: Vivienne Madeleine

customer_reviews.title: I love this dog food
customer_reviews.text: I love this dog food. I have 2 Dachshunds and they kept trying to eat wood chips. I asked the vet and they said they are missing something in their diet. My cousin who works at a vet said to try this food. I have been using it for over a year and it works great. Very happy dogs= happy dog momma
customer_reviews.author: Nakia Villarreal

customer_reviews.title: Healthy, happy dogs!
customer_reviews.text: My dogs always ate the regular Purina Pro plan shredded adult brand dog food. I got this to try it out, and wow, they act like they haven't eaten in a week when I put their bowls out! They really love this dog food! As soon as they hear the bag, they know what they are getting (normally I have their food in a large plastic container). It's like a kid in a candy store, they go crazy for it!
customer_reviews.author: Rob W

customer_reviews.title: Nutrition you can see!
customer_reviews.text: I started buying this food at my vets suggestion since one of my dogs wasn’t interested in any of the other foods I tried. (She was on a Blue Buffalo chow for a long time before she became disinterested in it.) She does like this one AND I can see a difference in her fur. It’s thicker and shinier. The color actually changed a bit darker also.
customer_reviews.author: Amy L.

customer_reviews.title: My dog likes it
customer_reviews.text: My Doberman likes the food but it took a couple of weeks for her system to adjust to this food. She is eating less of this than the Costco brand but her weight remains the same. I am confident this is because it’s a higher quality of food.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: My Puggle LOVES this, and it’s grain-free!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year-old Puggle LOVES this food! Pretty sure he would eat this 24/7 if I let him ;) Perfect for his grain-free dietary needs, yet he seems to really love the flavor and texture of both the small and larger sized bites. I have this on auto-shipment and highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Melanie C.

customer_reviews.title: One bad experience doesn’t outweigh the quality that is typically provided
customer_reviews.text: Typically I would say this is a great product. My dog has a very sensitive stomach, but she hasn’t had issues with this food. My one bad experience was with it is where (images posted are after filtering most of the powder out) almost a quarter of the bag was a powder. I’m guessing I just got a bad batch and this was just a bad luck delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Causing rash
customer_reviews.text: We switched brands and at first our Husky loved this food. But he soon developed a rash on his chin, in his mouth and ears. I would caution buying this dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Hpriebe10

customer_reviews.title: Fresh item
customer_reviews.text: My dog seems to like the food. It’s always fresh no problems with my dogs health.
customer_reviews.author: Francine Deeble

customer_reviews.title: Switched to Grain free
customer_reviews.text: My dog really likes this dry Purina Pro Plan Grain-Free Shredded Blend Turkey, Duck & Quail Formula. Disclaimer, I haven't tried it. I can only go by her actions when I open up the big container holding her dry food. I hope Purina keeps making this formula for a long time. Keep up the good work!
customer_reviews.author: Dominick

customer_reviews.title: My dogs would not tough it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs did not like this I have a pit pull and chihuahua the eat the same food, they would not touch it
customer_reviews.author: Tara R

customer_reviews.title: My Husky loves the Salmon & Beef
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product, excellent pricing. exact same brand at pet stores where it’s $59 plus tax. (24 lb) I love when this goes on sale through Amazon for $34.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Great food at a great value.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food, and it is so much gentler in his digestive system. His doggy flatulence disappeared.
customer_reviews.author: CAV

customer_reviews.title: Dogs really like it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food ! They don’t have any problems with allergies with this grain free food.
customer_reviews.author: diane

customer_reviews.title: I love it but sadly it is just tooooooo expensive to ...
customer_reviews.text: I love it but sadly it is just tooooooo expensive to buy so I have to buy something different for my pets.
customer_reviews.author: MindyLou1984

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this dog food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. Because it is dry, I always make sure there is plenty of fresh water available.
customer_reviews.author: Bre L.

customer_reviews.title: Dog food
customer_reviews.text: I have been feeding my two savior for a few years now. They seem to like it. I am pleased if they like it.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne B Bianchi

customer_reviews.title: Lower the price!
customer_reviews.text: Our dogs LOVE this stuff, and it really did help them lose some weight also. I wish the price didn’t keep going up because it forced us to switch to crave.
customer_reviews.author: SZero

customer_reviews.title: My Dogs Like Grain Free ProPlan Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My two dogs love this grain free ProPlan dog food. I had to try several grain free brands before I found a brand that they would eat at every meal, ProPlan is the one for them.
customer_reviews.author: Vintage Oaks Gal

customer_reviews.title: Sadie loves her food!
customer_reviews.text: Sadie loves her food! I mix it with Purina Beef and Wild Caught salmon soft and crumbles of Whole One Salmon treats! She gobbles it up and has good poops.
customer_reviews.author: Angela L. Kratky

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. They also like the regular one (not grain free one), just wish it wasn't so pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Trish

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. It resolved his allergy issues.
customer_reviews.author: Claire

customer_reviews.title: Grain free means itch free for my dog
customer_reviews.text: No more itching in the middle of the night for my doggie! Grain free is the way to go for us. Btw he also loves it!
customer_reviews.author: vickie

customer_reviews.title: YVC
customer_reviews.text: My dog has been eating this food for over a year but this is the first time I’ve purchased from Amazon. He now has profuse diarrhea since using new bag of food from Amazon. I’m going to have to throw out the entire bag. Never ordering dog food from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Yera C.

customer_reviews.title: Pro Plan Savor Adult Dry dog Food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this dog food. I have tried other brands, but this is the only one she will eat.
customer_reviews.author: Glenda

customer_reviews.title: Dog food
customer_reviews.text: why ask me about flavor as its dog food ???

customer_reviews.title: i didn't love it but my dog sure did hes a 20 ...
customer_reviews.text: i didn't love it but my dog sure did hes a 20 pound daschund not to big for him to chomp down
customer_reviews.author: justin

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact it was grain free but my dog does not. She will not eat the food.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnne Angerami

customer_reviews.title: Great food for my dogs
customer_reviews.text: My German Shepherd has hot spots. I changed his food to the grain free and his skin problems cleared up. My dogs love this food and have been eating it for years.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Check inside, bottom of bag
customer_reviews.text: In short, I found small worms at the bottom of the bag
customer_reviews.author: MS. P

customer_reviews.title: Not for me...but he loves it
customer_reviews.text: My dog liked it...I was not a fan of the crunch of it...but it’s not for me...he loves it
customer_reviews.author: Seth Karlin

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food. We buy from amazon because it is always bug free
customer_reviews.author: Hollie Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Pricey, but defiantly worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Grain free. Meet is # 1 ingredient. My two Australian Cattle Dogs gobbled it up with thinking twice.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Kutcher

customer_reviews.title: Dogs Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Dog s love it , and quick delivery every time , Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Catherine M.

customer_reviews.title: Great grain free dog food
customer_reviews.text: Both of my dogs love this dog food. I like that it has smaller kibbles and easy to chew shredded chicken pieces. Great for an older dog.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: Our vet recommended changing to this brand of grain free because it was the same quality of food for a lower price then the other brand we were using. It’s worked out perfectly fine for us. That was about a year ago and all is well.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Boarman

customer_reviews.title: Great value and high quality
customer_reviews.text: Great product! Very happy with it! Our dog is, too!
customer_reviews.author: JOANNE P.

customer_reviews.title: Great food at a reasonable price!
customer_reviews.text: Feed this to both of my dogs and they love it. Much cheaper than Blue. The softer pieces are good for my older boy.
customer_reviews.author: Kander

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love it! However I do feel it’s kinda pricey
customer_reviews.author: Damon

customer_reviews.title: Appears to be good quality food without a lot of fillers
customer_reviews.text: Appears to be good quality food without a lot of fillers. I don't like to be deceived by other brands saying grain-free when it's full of peas or rice, potatoes, or other high carbohydrates. This is a good quality food. Because of the quality, a smaller amount of food is as filling if not more. The price is comparable to the stores. I enjoy not having to go to the store.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Earley

customer_reviews.title: Random large kibble bits dangerous for dogs!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dog food after the regular one we usually purchase from Amazon was not available. This food has some HUGE pieces, that are about 1 square inch in size mixed in with the normal sized pieces. Super dangerous for our 15-lb dog. She kept choking while eating - an issue she has never had with any other dog food types.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My miniature dachshund loves the bits of turkey in this blend.
customer_reviews.author: ElwoodM

customer_reviews.title: Good food dogs love it
customer_reviews.text: Dogs love this food. Love having it demivered to my door
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Purina should know better.......
customer_reviews.text: I was not happy when Purina discontinued the Chicken and Egg Grain Free dog food without notice, therefore it’s the Purina company getting the one star. Our lab has a very sensitive digestive system and dog owners know you can’t just change a dog’s food “cold turkey”. So we were able to find a bag of her original dog food from another vendor (paid a premium price) and slowly introduced this product. So far, so good. I’ll update when she’s on this food 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Serlenga

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: It took a long time for the Dogs to like this will not buy again
customer_reviews.author: Mike N.

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love this food!
customer_reviews.text: My dog is grain free due to allergies and this was the only food that he liked. My other dog actually stopped eating his food and only wanted this as well!
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

product_meta.title: Purina Pro Plan SAVOR Grain-Free Shredded Blend Adult Dry Dog Food
product_meta.description: Flavor Name:Turkey & Chicken| Size:24 lb. BagGive your dog nutrition that performs when you offer him Purina Pro Plan SAVOR Grain Free Shredded Blend Turkey & Chicken Formula adult dry dog food. This grain-free recipe delivers protein from multiple sources, including real, high-quality turkey and chicken. Real meat in every serving helps provide the essential building blocks for the protein needs within your dog's body. This formula is made without corn, wheat, soy or poultry by-product meal and provides a wholesome meal in every bowlful. Vitamin A and linoleic acid, an omega-6 fatty acid, help to support his healthy skin and coat. He gets delicious flavor in every serving, along with a recipe made without artificial colors, flavors or preservatives. This dry dog food features crunchy, hard kibble and tender shredded pieces, giving your faithful companion a tempting duo in every bite. For the nutrition your dog needs and the convenience you want, order Purina Pro Plan on Amazon.com.
feature_bullets: One (1) 24 lb. Bag - Purina Pro Plan SAVOR Grain-Free Shredded Blend Turkey & Chicken Formula Adult Dry Dog Food
Made with real, high-quality turkey as the first ingredient
Dual texture of crunchy kibble and tender shredded pieces
Vitamin A and linoleic acid, an omega-6 fatty acid to support healthy skin and coat
Alternative sources of carbohydrates made without grain or soy
